definitions.definition: A unified fundamental force that combines the aspects of electricity and magnetism and is one of the four fundamental forces. (technically it can be unified with weak nuclear to form electroweak ) Its gauge boson is the photon .
Electricity and magnetism , collectively, as a field of study .

main_definition: A unified fundamental force that combines the aspects of electricity and magnetism and is one of the four fundamental forces. (technically it can be unified with weak nuclear to form electroweak ) Its gauge boson is the photon .
secondary_definitions: Electricity and magnetism , collectively, as a field of study .
